attributes.action: Widen the A14 into a 3 or 4 lane Motorway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The A14 is often at standstill. It is also a frequent site for accidents caused by the sheer volume of traffic that travels on that road every day. Widening the A14 to a 3 or 4 lane motorway would create more room for the excessive amount of traffic that uses the road and alleviate some of Cambridge's traffic problems.
